templates.name: 主轴健康风险监测图表

template.templateHtml:
健康值
0
00.51.0
template.templateCss: .leftdiv{ float:left; width:80px; height:65px; line-height:75px; font-size:50px; text-align: center; font-weight: normal; } .rightdiv{ float:left; width:calc(100% - 95px); margin-left:10px; } .txtdiv{ color:rgba(255,255,255,0.5); font-size:14px; font-weight: normal; } .bar div{ width:4px; height: 35px; border-radius: 10px; background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.3); float:left; margin-right:5px; } .bottomdiv{ margin-top:10px; } em{ font-size:18px; } .rightdiv span{ color:rgba(255,255,255,0.5); } .alarm{ color: rgb(224, 79, 35); } .warn{ color: #EAB62A; } .ok{ color:rgba(49, 178, 231,1); }
template.controllerScript: self.data= {spindle_fcft_score:0, spindle_alarm:1}; self.onInit= function(){self.data.spindle_fcft_score = 1; console.log(self.data); console.log(self.ctx.echarts) }, self.onResize = function(){self.onDataUpdated('重置')}, self.onDataUpdated = function(msg){ console.log(msg)},self.onClick = function(){ console.log('click'); console.log(self.ctx.echarts)}, self.onDestroy = function(){ console.log('销毁')}
